translation.en: ♪ I can feel it ♪ ♪ Coming in the air tonight ♪
Just when you think it's all over,
translation.ja: すべて終わったと思った瞬間

translation.en: something unspeakable comes after you and your family,
translation.ja: 忌まわしい存在が 家族を狙った

translation.en: murders your sister Jenny in cold blood, and disappears into thin air.
translation.ja: 妹のジェニーを無残にも殺し 姿を消したんだ

translation.en: But a clue left behind leads us here,
translation.ja: 俺たちは手がかりを追い

translation.en: to this club in Bangkok.
And that's why we still need the Wu Assassin.
translation.ja: だから五行の刺客が 必要なんだ

translation.en: What's a Wu Assassin?
All right. So about a year ago, my friends and I were living it up in San Francisco.
translation.ja: １年前 俺たちは サンフランシスコに住んでた

translation.en: Uh, my sister, Jenny, and I, we ran this restaurant, and, um, my boy Lu Xin, he ran cars,
translation.ja: 俺と妹はレストラン経営 ルー･シンは車のビジネスだ

translation.en: until she showed up. A 10,000- year- old warrior spirit brought back to Earth.
translation.ja: そこへ１万年前の戦士の魂が 舞い戻ってきて

translation.en: And then she gave her powers to Kai, my best friend. And then he became the last Wu Assassin. Whatever.
translation.ja: カイにパワーを与え 最後の五行の刺客とした

translation.en: What, like The Avengers?
translation.ja: アベンジャーズみたい

translation.en: - Yeah. - Hmm. - But Asian. - Hmm.
translation.ja: ああ でもアジア系だ

translation.en: Actually, no. More like that show from the '70s.
Kai and Lu Xin are the Angels. I'm like Charlie.
translation.ja: カイたちはエンジェルで 俺はチャーリー

translation.en: So what kind of mission?
Um, it's a supernatural one.
Sounds dangerous.
It's what we do.
- You seeing this? - You know why we're here.
So your friend Kai…
- What about him? - This Wu Assassin.
translation.ja: 何？ 特殊なパワーが 備わってるのね

translation.en: He's got to have some kind of powers, right?
translation.ja: 特殊なパワーが 備わってるのね

translation.en: He's empowered by this thing called the Dao.
translation.ja: 道(タオ)からパワーを得た

translation.en: He's faster and stronger than any man. He calls himself Death's Instrument.
translation.ja: 誰よりも速くて強く 死神の手先と自称してる

translation.en: And your other friend?
Oh no, he's just really good at kicking ass.
So why aren't you with them?
This seems more dangerous.
Do you want to continue your story somewhere else?
Hell, yeah.
What about your friends?
They'll be fine.
I think.
I fucking love Thailand.
Why Bangkok? I mean, what's here?
translation.ja: なぜバンコクに来たの？

translation.en: Answers.
I, uh, traced this material back to Thailand.
translation.ja: これの出どころが タイだからだよ

translation.en: It's from an ancient, old piece of stone.
translation.ja: 古代の石でできてるんだ

translation.en: Kai! Up there! He's turning them.
translation.ja: カイ　上だ 仲間を増やしてる

translation.en: Jiangshi. Chi vampire.
translation.ja: 気を吸うキョンシーだ

translation.en: - What's so special about this? -
I found it in my dead sister's hand.
Kai, Lu Xin, and I came back to my family restaurant,
translation.ja: カイたちと レストランに戻ったら

translation.en: and she was just there, dead on the ground.
translation.ja: ジェニーの亡骸(なきがら)が 横たわってた

translation.en: Well, here's to your sister.
translation.ja: 妹さんに献杯しましょ

translation.en: You want to know a secret?
Sure.
Come here.
I don't drink anymore.
This will turn you into a Jiangshi, won't it?
translation.ja: キョンシーになる薬だろ

translation.en: I just want to talk.
Your powers don't work on me.
Who killed Jenny?
translation.ja: 誰がジェニーを殺した

translation.en: Who killed my sister?
- Kai! -
- He's not talking! - Ah!
Assassin's strike.
That's not what I was thinking at all.
Yo. Hey, hey! What is this? Yo! Press the start button, man.
translation.ja: おい 何が起きてる スタートさせろ

translation.en: This isn't me.
It's me. I need your help.
You? Who are you?
No, I'm speaking through them.
I can't hold it for long.
It's not safe to put myself out here like this.
translation.ja: この状態は危険なんだ

translation.en: What do you want?
Not here.
8:00 a.m. Silom Temple archaeological dig site.
translation.ja: 朝８時 シロム寺の発掘現場だ

translation.en: We have much to discuss, Wu Assassin.
translation.ja: 五行の刺客に話がある

translation.en: I am never coming to a club with you ever again.
translation.ja: お前とは 二度とクラブに来ない

translation.en: - Who was that? - We should call Tommy.
translation.ja: 誰だった トミーを

translation.en: Stop the van!
Yeah. She didn't know anything.
What about your Jiangshi?
I guess we finally have a lead.
The archaeological site is owned by this biotech billionaire.
translation.ja: 現場の所有者は 生命工学の資産家

translation.en: Not much else on him, but he owns that building.
translation.ja: 情報は少ないが あのビルも持ってる

translation.en: So, uh, we're just going to roll onto his turf?
If it gets us closer to Jenny's killer, that's all that matters.
translation.ja: 犯人に近づけるならな

translation.en: Looks shady as fuck.
It should be up on the right.
Guessing he's not the valet.
Since founding his firm in 1999,
William Pan has formed collaboration agreements with the world's largest companies.
translation.ja: ウィリアム･パンは 世界中の大企業と提携

translation.en: Providing scientists the opportunity and resources
translation.ja: 科学者に機会を与え 人類の抱える難問に 取り組んできました

translation.en: to tackle humankind's most perplexing problems.
translation.ja: 人類の抱える難問に 取り組んできました

translation.en: All in service of William's unique vision.
translation.ja: 裏にあるのは彼のビジョン

translation.en: One people,
one world,
one planet.
We're not just looking to the future…
translation.ja: 未来を見るだけでなく

translation.en: we're looking to shape it.
Thank you for coming.
I know my message was unorthodox.
I apologize for not meeting you in person. Communicating like that was difficult.
translation.ja: 直接 顔を合わせずに 失礼したよ

translation.en: Dr. William Pan.
Do you know the story of Pan Gu?
Yeah, we do.
The first man to shape the universe from the great nothingness and made the heavens, the Earth, and the seas.
translation.ja: 最初の人間で宇宙を開き 天 地 海を形作った

translation.en: We all went to Chinese school.
Chinese school didn't teach you what happened to Pan Gu after he became a god.
translation.ja: 神になった後の話は 習ってないだろ

translation.en: He went mad with power. Threatened to remake the world in his own image.
translation.ja: 変になって 世界を再構築しようとした

translation.en: But the Dao, in its infinite celestial wisdom,
translation.ja: でも道が 永遠で神聖な知恵によって

translation.en: called upon the first Wu Assassin to strike down that first man.
translation.ja: 最初の五行の刺客を 送り込んだ

translation.en: Yin and yang. Chaos and order. These spirits have clashed for millennia.
translation.ja: 陰と陽 混乱と秩序だ 両者は数千年 対立してきた

translation.en: I'm not the first vessel.
But thanks to you, I am the last.
translation.ja: でも君がいれば 最後の１人になれる

translation.en: And with the world left unbalanced, chaos and I can finally complete our unending war.
translation.ja: 混乱との戦いを ついに終えられるんだ

translation.en: I was attacked. Barely made it out alive. And that's why I've retreated here for safety,
translation.ja: 私は襲われ 命からがら ここへ逃げ込んだ

translation.en: while my twin continues to spread chaos.
translation.ja: 相方は混乱を広げてる

translation.en: Who is he?
She. Yin and yang.
translation.ja: 女だ　陰陽だからな

translation.en: You might have heard of her. Ku An Qi.
translation.ja: 知ってるかも クー･アン･チーだ

translation.en: Queen of the Bangkok underworld.
She's going global. Taking out any threats to her.
translation.ja: 今は世界を狙い 競合を排除してる

translation.en: Consuming Chi to build her power.
The Shaolin in China. The Druids in Ireland.
translation.ja: 少林寺やドルイドも倒した

translation.en: And last month, she went to San Francisco.
translation.ja: 先月はサンフランシスコへ

translation.en: Ku An Qi was looking for you, but your friend intervened.
translation.ja: 君を捜してたが 友人が邪魔をした

translation.en: Jenny.
She fought valiantly.
But Ku cannot be stopped. She will continue her rampage if left unchecked.
translation.ja: でもクーは 止めないかぎり暴れ続ける

translation.en: How do you know all this?
Because Ku and I are connected.
That is why I must be careful.
If I open myself up to her, she will come.
translation.ja: 心を開けば クーに襲われるからね

translation.en: Follow me.
This whole thing could be bullshit.
In the fight, your sister took something of Ku's, a talisman.
translation.ja: 妹さんはクーの護符を取った

translation.en: I have the other half.
I assume you have hers.
What's it matter to you?
It's a piece of our Essence.
translation.ja: 精気だから奪い返しに来る

translation.en: - She'll try to get it back. - Good. Send her my way.
translation.ja: 精気だから奪い返しに来る 来させろよ

translation.en: In two days' time, my worse half
translation.ja: ２日後に⸺ クーはヴィーホテルで 三合会のボス５人と会う

translation.en: is meeting the heads of the Five Triads at the Vie Hotel, solidifying her power base.
translation.ja: クーはヴィーホテルで 三合会のボス５人と会う

translation.en: Cameras everywhere, no weapons allowed.
translation.ja: すべて監視され武器は不可

translation.en: - There's no honor in guns. - And won't she know what you're up to?
translation.ja: 銃は無意味だ クーにバレてる

translation.en: I'm doing my best to shield my thoughts from her.
My powers extend to the mind, while hers are focused on the body.
translation.ja: 私のパワーは心に及び クーのパワーは体に及ぶ

translation.en: A kidnapping mission in broad daylight.
Hotel security, the five bosses of the Triads, their whole crews.
translation.ja: ホテルの警備に 三合会のボス５人と手下

translation.en: You know what?
I got a better idea. Why don't you do the mind control thing and send an army after them?
translation.ja: マインドコントロールで 軍隊を送れよ

translation.en: I can't control an army.
I can reach out, communicate, hold a thought for a minute. - - But that is the extent of my powers now.
translation.ja: せいぜい誰かの考えを １分止める程度だ

translation.en: Well, it seems like you got all the answers, but the answers.
translation.ja: 情報はあっても 解決策はないようだな

translation.en: We're in.
When you subdue Ku, you bring her to me with the talisman,
translation.ja: 捕まえたら護符も渡せ

translation.en: and I'll take care of the rest.
No. You said the Dao is broken.
translation.ja: いや 道は壊れたんだろ

translation.en: Yes.
But you and I together, maybe we can restore it.
translation.ja: でも一緒に修復できるさ

translation.en: Or we let it be broken.
And I kill her.
The hotel, it's a death trap.
Yeah, but it's the person, demigod, whatever, who murdered Jenny.
translation.ja: でも犯人は半神であれ人間だ

translation.en: Yes, I understand that, which is why we need to be smart about it.
translation.ja: だからこそ 賢く立ち回るべきだ

translation.en: - Look at the pieces in front of us. - This isn't a game.
translation.ja: だからこそ 賢く立ち回るべきだ ゲームじゃない

translation.en: Actually, it is a game. Everything is a game, Tommy.
translation.ja: ゲームだよ すべてはゲームだ

translation.en: We have the perfect opportunity right now. We should take advantage of it.
translation.ja: 今がその機会だ 利用しなきゃ

translation.en: If you have a death wish because of your sister, don't drag me--
You act like you don't care about Jenny at all!
- That's the game. No one's safe. - Ah, fuck you, man.
translation.ja: 危険なんだぞ クソめ

translation.en: - Yeah, fuck you too. - Guys! Calm down.
translation.ja: アホ おい 冷静になれ

translation.en: I'm calm!
Ku An Qi wants the Wu Assassin. I'll give her the Wu Assassin. Myself.
translation.ja: クーは五行の刺客を捜してる 俺が行く

translation.en: We're going together.
- No. - It might not be the smartest choice,
translation.ja: いや 賢い選択じゃなくても 他にない

translation.en: but, look, this is the only opportunity we have.
translation.ja: 賢い選択じゃなくても 他にない

translation.en: Fuck that. No way. I'll do this one alone.
translation.ja: ダメだ　俺が１人でやる

translation.en: You know what your problem is, Kai? You think because you have powers, you're better than us.
translation.ja: お前の問題は 自分が上だと思ってる点だ

translation.en: Like we're just some kind of fucking burden.
Lu Xin is calling his contact.
Can he get a rocket launcher to take Ku down?
translation.ja: ロケット砲が手に入る？

translation.en: You never know, with magic.
But I guess this worked.
Let me show you something.
Keep this finger loose. It'll make it easier.
translation.ja: 指の力を抜けば簡単にできる

translation.en: Try that.
I'm coming. I don't care what you say.
translation.ja: 何を言っても行くからな

translation.en: I have to go. Okay?
Look, Tommy.
You go angry, you get yourself killed.
translation.ja: 頭に血が上れば殺される

translation.en: That's… that's not how you fight.
translation.ja: それじゃ戦えないんだ

translation.en: You got to understand, though, man.
It's the only thing I have.
Anger.
Sorry to break up the tanning session, boys.
Bad news.
The dude who outfitted us for the Jiangshi mission blocked me. Too much heat at the club.
translation.ja: 協力者にブロックされた 騒ぎのせいだ

translation.en: Anyone else?
I mean, as soon as they hear we're going after Ku An Qi, they lose my number fast.
translation.ja: クーの名前を出すだけで 切られる

translation.en: I might know someone crazy enough to help.
translation.ja: 助けてくれる人がいるかも

translation.en: What? Since when did you get a Bangkok hookup?
I said might. I'll hit her up.
translation.ja: 分からないけど聞いてみる

translation.en: Something just doesn't feel right about this.
Something smells good.
- Whoa,. - Thank you so much.
What's Preeya look like anyway?
Like that.
Hey! How are you?
- Hey! - It's been a long time. What's happen--
Now we've got that over with. What's up, Thomas?
translation.ja: ここまでよ 何の用？　トーマス

translation.en: Uh, first, why are we meeting here?
translation.ja: トーマス？ まず なぜここで会う？

translation.en: Oh, you know, support the local economy.
Plus, it's out in the open. Can't be
too careful these days.
You, I know.
Them…
- - …don't know.
Oh shit.
Where are we going?
Ah, too many questions.
You know who I work for?
translation.ja: ＩＣＰＯ(インターポール)で働いてる

translation.en: Interpol, police of the world.
translation.ja: ＩＣＰＯ(インターポール)で働いてる 世界の警察だぞ

translation.en: We know your Triad is meeting with Ku An Qi, a known terrorist.
translation.ja: 三合会が クー･アン･チーと会うだろ

translation.en: When? And where?
Good luck.
That means, fuck off.
Both of you.
You wanna have fun?
The Vie Hotel, tomorrow.
You might wanna call in the cleaners.
translation.ja: クリーナーが必要かも

translation.en: I thought he gave you the information.
The actual cleaners. He soiled himself.
translation.ja: 清掃員よ　彼がお漏らしした

translation.en: Uh, Preeya, meet the boys.
translation.ja: プリーヤ 紹介する

translation.en: Boys, this is, uh, Preeya.
'Sup. Lu Xin.
- Lu, is that a Sin or a Xin? - Is that supposed to be a funny joke?
translation.ja: スィン？　シン？ それ冗談？

translation.en: - What's his problem? - Don't worry. He's cool.
translation.ja: 何なの 気にするな　彼はカイだ

translation.en: Uh, this is my man, Kai.
translation.ja: 気にするな　彼はカイだ

translation.en: - Hello. - Hello.
See? Someone's got manners.
- Where's your sister? - Oh, she's not here.
That's too bad. I love Jen.
translation.ja: 残念だな　好きなのに

translation.en: Anywho. Hear you boys are on a suicide mission.
translation.ja: それより 玉砕したいんだって？

translation.en: What the fuck, Thomas. You told her?
It's the only way she'd help. I have to tell her everything.
translation.ja: 力を借りるためだ 当然のことでしょ

translation.en: Yeah, I like to know what I'm getting into.
Due diligence.
If you know, then why are you helping?
translation.ja: 知ってても助けるのか

translation.en: I don't mind a little action. It's part of the territory.
translation.ja: ここでは戦いは普通よ

translation.en: This woman you're dealing with, serious shit. Lots of people dying.
translation.ja: 敵はクソ女で 大勢が命を落としてる

translation.en: She needs to be stopped.
Can you get this?
Let me make some calls.
Enjoy your shopping, boys.
Keep your mouth shut.
Shopping?
The fuck?
- Thank you. -
- Tommy? - Yeah.
How do you know her again?
So I was actually here five years ago, and someone stole my Louis V backpack.
translation.ja: ５年前 ヴィトンのバッグを盗まれた

translation.en: They took my wallet, passport, phone, everything.
So I went to the cops to report it, and, uh, the cops didn't do anything. - So, someone told me to go talk to-- - Uh.
translation.ja: 警察は何もしてくれなくて 誰かがプリーヤの元へ…

translation.en: I'm just gonna make this story short and sweet, in case we ever have to hear it again, okay?
translation.ja: 次に聞かされる時に備え 要約する

translation.en: He got his shit jacked, and he doesn't know anything about her.
translation.ja: 彼女のことは何も知らない

translation.en: Okay, guys. Look, she's our only hookup.
- We need this. - And beggars can't be choosers.
translation.ja: でも他にいないだろ 背に腹は代えられない

translation.en: - Did you get it? - Yes, every goddamn thing.
translation.ja: どう 全部 手に入れた

translation.en: - See? -
Thank you!
Listen. I know it's none of my business.
translation.ja: 聞いて 私には関係ないけど

translation.en: But, you know, I'm fond of this one. So I got to tell you guys that your plan--
translation.ja: 彼を好きだから言わせて この計画は…

translation.en: Is none of your business.
Relax, big guy.
- - We're on the same team.
There is no way you're getting that hardware into the Vie Hotel.
translation.ja: ホテルに武器を 持ち込むのは無理

translation.en: It's locked down tight, and the only way in is through the front.
translation.ja: 警備が厳重で 正面から入るしかない

translation.en: I don't like this. We need to rethink it.
translation.ja: 嫌だね　考え直そう

translation.en: All right. I'll take care of it.
No. Tomorrow, we're all going. We're gonna get Jenny's killer together.
translation.ja: ３人で妹の殺害犯を捕まえる

translation.en: Hey! Yo! Jen's dead?
translation.ja: ちょっと　亡くなったの？

translation.en: Uh, yeah. Our target took her out.
Now it's our turn.
Shit.
I'm so sorry.
I can help you get in.
It's dangerous.
I know.
Security there is tight. We can use that to our advantage.
translation.ja: 警備が厳重なら 私たちは逆手を取れる

translation.en: We?
Morning, boys.
Hey. Thanks.
Is this your idea of a joke?
Trust me. This is 007 shit.
translation.ja: 信じて 007が使いそうな兵器よ

translation.en: We're good.
Okay. Be careful with these.
Wow. What's so special about them?
- Magic. - Come on. Let's go.
translation.ja: 魔術だ さあ 行くぞ

translation.en: Hey.
We're gonna get justice for her.
What do you think?
You don't want to know, Lu.
Then we're thinking the same thing.
Come on.
Okay. Whoa, whoa! What did we do? We didn't do anything!
Goddamn!
A bit much, isn't it?
Are you guys seeing this?
Looks like a dipshit nobody.
Ah.
Get up.
- All right. Easy. Easy. - Can I talk to your manager?
translation.ja: そっとね 支配人か ゆっくり

translation.en: Hey, we're just on holiday.
- - We're valued customers.
One- star Yelp review on the way!
Agent Zulu.
Let the hotel security handle that. You just focus on…
translation.ja: ホテルに任せるの こちらは…

translation.en: Why are you here?
You're wasting your time.
It's for Songkran, the Thai water festival.
That's not until April.
Yeah. Well, we like to be prepared.
Now you're gonna have to reorganize her bag.
You for real?
Yes, I'm for real.
- Bullshit! - Look at all this mess.
translation.ja: 冗談を 散らかしたな

translation.en: Stay here.
What's going on?
Where is our fucking visual?
- I'm working on it. - Our gear is still working.
translation.ja: お待ちを こっちはＯＫ ホテル側の問題ね

translation.en: Whatever is happening is only affecting the hotel.
translation.ja: こっちはＯＫ ホテル側の問題ね

translation.en: Something is going down.
This is not good.
- - Zulu! Zulu!
You are my men now.
- Close your eyes. - What?
Just close your eyes.
- Trust me. - Come on!
Hey!
Come on. Let's get out of here.
- - See you in a second.
Stop!
- Good timing. - Yeah. Of course it is.
Ah, fuck. Who the fuck did this?
translation.ja: マジか 誰の仕業だ

translation.en: - Hands where I can see 'em. -
Zama?
Lu.
What are you doing here?
- You know her? - Yeah, we met in London.
I was pushing some Aston Martins, and my broker turned out to be Interpol's finest.
translation.ja: 高級車のブローカーが ＩＣＰＯだった

translation.en: - Look, hey, these bodies-- - Get down on your knees!
translation.ja: なあ 犯人は… ひざまずけ

translation.en: This wasn't us.
So you just tripped and fell into a massacre?
Zama, you know me. You think I would do this?
There's a lot I don't know about you, Lu.
This is bigger and more complicated than you can imagine.
translation.ja: 君の想像を超える事態だ

translation.en: Try me.
The fate of the world.
- I didn't come to fuck around. - Don't!
Agent Boucher. I have two suspects. I need backup.
translation.ja: ブシェ捜査官 容疑者２人 応援を

translation.en: Boucher?
Whoever got them probably got your team.
translation.ja: 真犯人にやられたんだ

translation.en: Interlace your fingers behind your head, - and get down on the floor. -
translation.ja: 頭の後ろで手を組んで伏せて

translation.en: - I don't want to hurt you. - Kai. Don't.
translation.ja: 傷つけたくない カイ　よせ

translation.en: Listen to your friend. He seems to be the reasonable one.
translation.ja: 友人に従って　彼は理性的よ

translation.en: First time I've heard that. Lower your gun.
translation.ja: 初耳だね　銃を下げろ

translation.en: - What the fuck happened here? - We're working on it.
Let her go. She's not the threat. Please.
translation.ja: 放せ　脅威じゃない

translation.en: Look, it's clear that none of us are the bad guys.
translation.ja: ねえ ここに悪人はいないけど

translation.en: But they are coming.
Who's coming?
The entire hotel.
On your six!
- I got it. - I'm just looking out for you.
- Because that's always been your MO. - Here we go again.
translation.ja: いつもの手ね またか

translation.en: You could just say sorry. - What?  - Sorry works just fine.
translation.ja: 謝れよ　それで済む

translation.en: Did you guys, like, used to date or--
- No! - No!
Zan.
Assassin.
Why are you here?
They offered me a deal. The Wu Assassin in exchange for power.
translation.ja: 呼ばれた お前を倒して権力を授かる

translation.en: Where we going?
- Fuck. Come with me - Go!
Shit!
Fuck! Get in the car!
Looks like you're not the only special one.
Look out!
Hey. Hey, hey, take it easy.
translation.ja: なあ 手荒くしないで

translation.en: Fuck.
It's locked!
Go!
Door says push, not pull.
What?
Hold up. Where's Kai?
Don't worry about Kai, all right?
Oh shit. You okay?
Yo, you good?
Zan?
- Yo, we gotta go. Come on. - My van's still here. Come on!
translation.ja: 行くぞ バンがまだある

translation.en: Get in.
- What happened back there? - What happened in here?
translation.ja: 何があった ここも

translation.en: This is chaotic. You know what to do.
translation.ja: カオスだな　任せたぞ

translation.en: If only you would've listened to me when I told you something's sketchy.
translation.ja: だから妙だと言ったのに

translation.en: We didn't have another lead.
Take them down.
Get me out of here now.
- Shit. - What?
In case you thought we lost 'em, we didn't.
translation.ja: 奴(やつ)らがついて来た

translation.en: - Hold tight. -
Can you get to Khaosan Road? - We have another safe house there. - Yeah.
translation.ja: カオサン通りへ 隠れ家がある

translation.en: Shit.
It's the end of the road.
Shit.
Get out of the car!
- She's locking down the city. - What are we gonna do?
translation.ja: 封鎖とは どうする

translation.en: Sail away.
I'm really starting to strongly dislike you.
We get to the canal. Take a boat up the Chao Phraya.
translation.ja: 運河から川を上るのよ

translation.en: That plan is just--
Stop firing.
Get them out of the car. Bring them to me.
I changed my mind. I like the plan.
Yeah. River, boat.
- If you wanna join me, guns are up top. - Come on.
translation.ja: 撃つなら銃はあるよ 行って

translation.en: Shoot it! Let's get these fuckers!
translation.ja: 見ろよ　ぶっ倒そう

translation.en: Ah, fuck. I'm all out.
They're trying to burn us alive. We gotta go!
translation.ja: 焼け死ぬぞ　行こう

translation.en: Okay. Everybody, follow me.
Hey!
Hey. Hey.
♪ So I, I only spit fire and dope ♪ ♪ So later on you can go quote ♪
translation.ja: 君たち 話をしようよ

translation.en: Yo, what's up?
- ♪ Never lose sight, I'm true dude ♪ - Good timing.
Never seen that before.
I picked up a few things since you ghosted me.
translation.ja: 捨てられた後 覚えた

translation.en: Yeah. Well, if I'd have stayed, it would've been behind bars, wouldn't it?
translation.ja: 収監する気だったくせに

translation.en: This way. The river.
Get out the way!
Get to the boat!
Get out the way!
Get off my boat!
Kai! Look out!
- Go, go! -
- Get us out of here! - Come on!
Hurry, they're catching up!
Get out of the way! Get out of the way!
translation.ja: 通して どいてくれ

translation.en: We're almost there. It's just up ahead.
translation.ja: もうすぐよ　すぐそこ

translation.en: Ah, Preeya!
You are back.
I didn't know if we'd ever see you.
Everyone's excited to see you.
So this is your home.
- It's been a while since I was last here. - What about your family?
translation.ja: 久しぶりに帰った ご家族は？

translation.en: They were long gone before that.
What's this?
Magical protection.
If they don't want you, you can't pass.
I guess they want us in.
This is the home of a shaman.
He knows everything about the supernatural.
translation.ja: 超常現象にすごく詳しい

translation.en: If anyone might know what's going on, it's Chatree.
translation.ja: 説明できる人がいるなら チャートリーよ

translation.en: You used to call me a charlatan, didn't you?
Uncle!
It's nice to meet everyone.
You all must be starving.
- 100% - How'd you know?
Usually, I am the one showing hospitality.
translation.ja: 普段(ふだん)は私がもてなす

translation.en: You are.
It is my honor to have such an esteemed guest.
translation.ja: 立派な客が来てうれしいよ

translation.en: What do you know about Pan Gu?
In Thailand, we don't talk business on an empty stomach.
translation.ja: タイでは 空腹で大切な話をしない

translation.en: Is that a saying?
One that I just made up.
There are people after us.
There will always be people after you.
Here we are well- protected. We have weapons.
translation.ja: ここは守られていて 武器もある

translation.en: Is this a prank?
No.
But it is funny that this bracelet is yours.
translation.ja: だが不思議だ 腕輪は君に渡すが⸺

translation.en: But it is not for you.
You speak like Yoda, old man.
Baby Yoda. I am only 50.
translation.ja: ベビーヨーダだ 50歳だからな

translation.en: Pan Gu.
Uncle.
William Pan, he wasn't, uh, completely honest with you.
translation.ja: ウィリアム･パンは ウソも言った

translation.en: Yeah? No shit.
Pan and Ku An Qi are opposite forces.
translation.ja: パンとクーは 相反するパワーだ

translation.en: Yin
and yang.
But they are not in opposition to each other. They are two halves of a whole.
translation.ja: 敵対しているのではなく ２つで１つを成す

translation.en: They have been working in harmony
through all their births, lives, deaths, rebirths
translation.ja: 生や死 命や再生を つかさどってきた

translation.en: towards one goal,
reforming back to Pan Gu, the first man.
translation.ja: 盤古の役割を 果たしてきたのだ

translation.en: And using their power, they will remake the world in their image.
translation.ja: パワーを使えば 世界の再構築もできる

translation.en: And now that the Dao is broken, they have the opportunity.
translation.ja: そして道が壊れた今は 彼らにとってチャンスだ

translation.en: How will they do that?
By harnessing the Chi of the one who split them.
translation.ja: 彼らを分割した者の 気を利用する

translation.en: The Wu Assassin.
The two of them each have a piece of their old Essence.
translation.ja: 彼らはそれぞれ 精気を持っている

translation.en: The only constant they have, forged from the stone of the temple where they were split.
translation.ja: 陰陽を分割した寺の 石でできた護符だ

translation.en: If they can infuse the pieces with Kai's Chi,
translation.ja: ２つの護符に カイの気を込めれば

translation.en: they will be able to connect the halves.
Does it look something like this?
Where did you get that from?
I mean, it doesn't matter.
If it's part of Ku, we'll just destroy it--
translation.ja: クーの一部なら壊そう

translation.en: - - It can't be destroyed!
I've had quite enough, thank you. This…
translation.ja: 満腹よ　ごちそうさま

translation.en: This whole thing is just crazy.
- - You okay?
I'm just trying to wrap my head around
translation.ja: 理解しようと頑張ってるの

translation.en: this supernatural shit and the world ending.
translation.ja: この超常現象と 世界の終わりをね

translation.en: Yeah.
What did you do when you first found out?
translation.ja: 初めて知った時 どうした？

translation.en: I had just shot a Russian gangster in the face.
translation.ja: ギャングの顔を 撃った後だったから

translation.en: So you could say it was a little bit weird.
Honestly?
I poured myself a big fucking drink.
- - Ugh. This is terrible.
Can't be worse than that Chinese whiskey we had in Brick Lane.
translation.ja: ロンドンの時よりマシ

translation.en: Yeah. Well, that was… that was part of a job, so…
translation.ja: あれは 仕事の一環だったからね

translation.en: - - Is that what I was to you?
Just part of the job.
I can taste when you're lying.
Training?
Meditation.
My meditation is meditation.
- You're not worried about us losing? - No, I'm not.
Because if that should happen, Pan Gu would remake the world,
translation.ja: 盤古が世界を再構築するなら

translation.en: and we would simply be the forgotten dreams of a butterfly.
translation.ja: 我々は蝶の夢となるだけだ

translation.en: Sounds peaceful.
But that is the one thing that the Wu Assassin can never have.
translation.ja: 刺客には 決して手が届かない

translation.en: He may have friends that he's shutting out.
translation.ja: 友人にすら 心を開けないのだからな

translation.en: It's my responsibility to protect them.
You have lost one. And now you're trying everything to avoid that pain again.
translation.ja: １人を失い これ以上 失うまいと必死だ

translation.en: They're all I have left.
But Pan Gu seeks to control all.
translation.ja: 盤古はすべてを 支配しようとしている

translation.en: What do you want, Wu Assassin?
We'll stop him.
We'll stop him. We'll make plans.
There's a Jeep there.
There is the path that leads to the main road.
translation.ja: 本線へ続く道はあちらだ

translation.en: From there, it's an easy ride to wherever.
translation.ja: どんな所へでも 簡単に行くことができる

translation.en: You did not come here to train or reflect.
translation.ja: ここへ来たのは 訓練や熟考のためではない

translation.en: You came here to leave after everyone went to bed.
translation.ja: 全員が寝たら １人で旅立つためだ

translation.en: Last time I was here was, um…
translation.ja: 前 ここにいたのは

translation.en: ten years ago.
Family had a farm by the river.
translation.ja: 川沿いに実家があった

translation.en: There was a bad flood.
Water came suddenly, and just like that…
translation.ja: 突然 水が入ってきて 一瞬のことだった

translation.en: my mum, my dad,
and my sister were gone.
No magical attack.
translation.ja: 不思議な力の攻撃でもなく

translation.en: No clash for the world. It was, uh,
translation.ja: 世界の終わりでもない

translation.en: just an accident.
There's nothing I can do to bring my family back,
translation.ja: 家族は取り戻せないけど⸺

translation.en: but I thought I could bring you some peace for Jen.
translation.ja: あなたの心の平和は 取り返せる

translation.en: And that is why I'm helping.
At least there's something you can do.
translation.ja: 少なくとも あなたには何かができる

translation.en: You have Kai,
Lu Xin.
Me…
I'm all alone.
I'm sorry.
I didn't know.
Well, you never asked.
This can't be real.
It isn't.
It's the version of the village in your mind
from when you were a child.
But we can make it like this again.
We can make it into whatever we want.
Pan Gu is all.
Mum, Dad, Ratana!
translation.ja: 〈母さん 父さん ラタナ〉

translation.en: - - I miss you.
You can be together again… - - …forever.
translation.ja: 永遠に一緒にいられるぞ

translation.en: All we need is one small thing.
The Wu Assassin's Chi.
It'll be easy.
- What are you doing? - I had no choice.
- What did they promise you? -
Get up.
What's going on?
What do you think?
I fuck with these.
- There's more down there. Let's go. - Yo! Tommy, hold up!
translation.ja: 下にもいる トミー　待て

translation.en: I'll get Preeya.
- What? - Be careful, okay?
I am getting really, really sick of this shit.
translation.ja: マジで この状況が 嫌になってきたぜ

translation.en: Tommy, get the Jeep. We'll hold them off while Zama and Preeya get here.
translation.ja: 車を出せ　女性陣を待つ

translation.en: Preeya betrayed us.
- No. She wouldn't. - What?
She took Ku An Qi's necklace.
- Fuck. - Lu, get Zama. Tommy, the car!
translation.ja: クソ ザーマを呼べ　お前は車を

translation.en: - Hold on. We're stronger together. - Just do as I say!
translation.ja: ザーマを呼べ　お前は車を 俺に従え

translation.en: Shit.
Oh shit.
Zama. Preeya betrayed us. We gotta go now.
translation.ja: おい プリーヤが裏切った 行くぞ

translation.en: I know. I saw her leave with Pan's men. Let's go.
Calm down, boys.
All right. Let's go, guys!
Come on, let's go.
Come on, everybody in.
You can no longer be stopped.
It's in your hands now. Go!
Don't let Pan Gu reform!
- No! Chatree! - Get in the car!
- We need to go! - Drive, Tommy!
translation.ja: 行かないと 車を出せ

translation.en: We shouldn't have left Chatree.
- Should have listened to me. - There wasn't anything to listen to.
translation.ja: 妙だと言ったのに やるしかないから俺が決めた

translation.en: - I made a decision. - Yeah. Nothing new there, Kai.
translation.ja: やるしかないから俺が決めた いつもどおり

translation.en: - I'm leading us. - No, you're not. You're shutting us out.
translation.ja: 導いてる 心を閉ざしてる

translation.en: Guys, let's focus on what the fuck we're gonna do now.
I'm sorry. You have no right to say shit.
translation.ja: 悪いが話す権利はない

translation.en: - What the fuck you talking about? - What do you mean?
translation.ja: 何だと 何を言ってやがる

translation.en: Your little girlfriend that you brought into our inner circle betrayed us.
You gonna put that on me?
Sure, you weren't on the lookout either. You were occupied fucking Zama.
translation.ja: お前こそ見張らず ザーマとヤッてた

translation.en: And, Kai, like, what the fuck? What were you doing? What was your plan?
translation.ja: カイもなんてザマだ 計画は？

translation.en: My plan was to kill Pan and Ku myself.
- Like I should have done. - Yeah? Great, 'cause you're always right.
translation.ja: １人で敵を倒したかった すごい　常に正しいな

translation.en: We don't need you. I don't need any of you.
True! I'm going myself.
- Get the fuck out of here! - Just stop it!
translation.ja: 行っちまえ やめて

translation.en: All of you. You're acting like little children.
Do I need to remind you
that we need to stop a god from destroying reality?
translation.ja: 神が現実を 壊そうとしてるのよ

translation.en: You say you're a family. You're not acting like a family,
translation.ja: 家族だと言うけど そうは見えない

translation.en: not one that's about to save the world. Because you cannot even take care of each other.
translation.ja: ３人でうまくやれずに 世界を救えるわけがない

translation.en: If you can…
just get over your anger…
your guilt…
Your ego.
We might actually have a chance. We really might.
translation.ja: チャンスは あるかもしれない

translation.en: So, let's remind ourselves.
Why are we here?
For Jenny.
She's right.
We're all fucking idiots.
No, no, no, no. No.
translation.ja: いや そうじゃないよ

translation.en: I'm the idiot.
I'm a fucking idiot.
For Jenny.
- For Jenny. - For Jenny.
Now we're getting somewhere.
When we were at Pan's temple,
translation.ja: 陰陽の印が 別の発掘現場にあるのを見た

translation.en: I saw that splitting symbol in a photo of a factory at another dig site.
translation.ja: 陰陽の印が 別の発掘現場にあるのを見た 〝鉄工所〞

translation.en: That's where the stone came from, so we gotta go to that dig site.
translation.ja: 護符の出どころだから行こう

translation.en: But they only have half of the symbol completed, so, like,
translation.ja: 印は半分しか 完成してないから

translation.en: they're gonna need your power.
No. We shouldn't risk it.
No, no. We should. We should.
Because they'll come after all of us if we don't stop them.
translation.ja: 奴らを止めないと 全員が追われる

translation.en: This ends tonight.
If you all agree.
As long as we're smart about it.
You can count me in.
- We are all the Wu Assassins. -
Shit.
- Let's go kill a god. - Let's do it.
There are a lot of guards here.
They'll know we're coming.
They already know I'm here.
In that case…
- - Boom.
This is where the first Wu Assassin tore us apart.
translation.ja: 最初の刺客が 私たちを裂いた所ね

translation.en: They'll be here soon.
This Wu Assassin is particularly hard to kill.
translation.ja: 今回の刺客は殺すのが大変

translation.en: I got this.
This thing killed my uncle.
translation.ja: これがおじさんを殺した

translation.en: How many more people have to die before I get my family back?
translation.ja: あと何人 死ななきゃならない？

translation.en: Your problem, child, is that you see death as the end.
translation.ja: 死を最後だと 思うのは間違いだ

translation.en: - You'll be with them soon enough. -
Along with all living things.
That's where the stone is melted. Those are the sleeping quarters.
translation.ja: 石が溶けた所だ そこは居住区

translation.en: - Those are the main pressing machines. - How do you know?
translation.ja: プレス機だ 詳しいな

translation.en: Wikipedia.
We gotta be careful. They still need you for the ritual, so…
translation.ja: 気をつけろ お前は狙われるからな

translation.en: Get down! Move!
Zan.
- What do you want to do? - We're splitting up.
translation.ja: どうする 分かれよう

translation.en: Yeah. We're not divided. We're dividing them.
translation.ja: ああ 奴らを分断しよう

translation.en: I got Zan. Lu, the Beast.
translation.ja: 俺はザン　ルーはあいつ

translation.en: You guys find Pan and Ku.
- - Fuck!
Try this. It's got good range.
- Be careful. - Okay.
Zan!
Let's finish this.
I promised myself I'd erase anything related to when I was a pawn of your father's.
translation.ja: お前の父に仕えた過去は 全部 消す

translation.en: We started with Jenny.
And it ends when I kill you, Assassin.
You're not the one I'm looking for.
Well, we are who you've got, bitch.
translation.ja: 私たちしか いないんでね

translation.en: The necklace isn't here. None of this matters if we can't find it.
translation.ja: 護符がない なけりゃ無意味だ

translation.en: They're not fools, Tommy. Let's go find the others.
translation.ja: 敵はバカじゃない 仲間を捜そう

translation.en: You fucking piece of shit.
- The fuck were you thinking? - Wait. No. Stop.
translation.ja: よせよ　やめてくれ

translation.en: Hey.
Tell me they mind- controlled you.
They told me I could see my family again,
translation.ja: 家族に会えると言われ 判断を誤った

translation.en: and I made a mistake, and I'm so sorry. So sorry!
translation.ja: 家族に会えると言われ 判断を誤った 本当にごめんなさい

translation.en: I messed up.
Hey.
It's okay. It's okay.
Mastery over the body has its perks.
Fucking magic.
- Give up. - Never.
Get up!
This isn't for me. This is for all of us.
translation.ja: 俺だけじゃなく 俺たち全員のためだ

translation.en: Welcome.
- Lu Xin! - He'll be fine.
Your friends took out Ku.
But you
will not be so lucky.
I am Pan Gu, the first man.
translation.ja: わしは盤古 最初の人間だ

translation.en: Control of mind, body, and soul.
translation.ja: 心と体と魂 そのすべてを支配する

translation.en: Lu. Lu, wait. Hey.
Brother. It's not you!
- Pan Gu! - Kai.
- What the fuck? -
The trouble is, you are but one man,
translation.ja: お前は１人の人間に過ぎない

translation.en: while I am all.
translation.ja: だがわしは すべてなのだ

translation.en: Brother, I don't want to do this.
Thank you for your sacrifice.
translation.ja: お前の犠牲に感謝しよう

translation.en: No. No!
Lu! Lu! Lu!
translation.ja: ルー おい 聞こえるか

translation.en: Fight it.
We can't do this without you.
Fight it, brother! Wake up!
Come on, Lu! Get up!
We need you, brother!
Tommy.
- Come on. You can do it. - Fucking bitch.
translation.ja: さあ 起きて あのクソ女

translation.en: I think we've got bigger problems. Let's go.
translation.ja: 何か起きてる 行こう

translation.en: Let's go.
What the fuck happened?
Is that you? Hey.
Of course, it's fucking me. Who else would it be?
translation.ja: 当然だろ　他に誰がいる

translation.en: Nice.
Let's kill this motherfucker.
Oh, fuck, yeah.
- - Lu!
- Kai! - Lu, what's going on?
- Ah, Lu! Ah! - It's sinking!
Grab that.
Kai! Heads up!
- I can't hold. - Hold on. Hold on, Kai!
translation.ja: もたない 手を放すなよ

translation.en: Lu!
Stay there. Zama!
translation.ja: ここを頼む ザーマ

translation.en: - Yeah? - Follow me.
Tie that!
Gotcha.
- This is serious, man. - No shit!
- You guys know knots? - We're about to find out.
Girl Scout those ropes together.
We'll bring 'em up with up this. Let me know when there's enough rope.
translation.ja: これで引き上げる 縄の調整だ

translation.en: Kai, this isn't working. Come up with something. You're the Wu Assassin.
translation.ja: まずいぞ 刺客なら何とかしろ

translation.en: Come on! Grab it! Grab it!
translation.ja: さあ 縄を下ろして

translation.en: - Zama? - Almost there.
Let me know when you guys are good.
Start pulling!
Ah! It's about time.
All right, guys. I need help. Come on! Come on!
translation.ja: 手伝って 急いでくれ

translation.en: Come on, Zama.
Keep going! Keep going! Keep going!
It's over.
I know a really nice, safe passage out. Come on.
translation.ja: 安全で安らげる帰り道を 知ってる 行こう

translation.en: Food's ready, guys.
Looks good.
Hold it, man. First, a toast.
translation.ja: まずは乾杯だ 新しい家族と 古い家族に乾杯

translation.en: To family. New and old.
translation.ja: 新しい家族と 古い家族に乾杯

translation.en: To family. Cheers!
translation.ja: 家族に 家族に 乾杯

translation.en: To Jenny.
To Jenny.
So, Kai, what's next?
- I'm off to fight a necromancer. - Ooh!
I guess we're going on vacation then.
- We? I thought you could handle yourself. - What do you mean?
translation.ja: 全員？　自分で遊べよ

translation.en: Oh wow. Here we go with the talk.
Look, look, look, just 'cause I kicked your ass,
translation.ja: いいか 俺がお前をやっつけた話は しなくていいぜ

translation.en: all of us saw it, but we don't have to talk about it.
translation.ja: 俺がお前をやっつけた話は しなくていいぜ

translation.en: - You wanna spar? You wanna try me? - Do I want to spar?
I don't got to prove anything to you!
You're the Wu Assassin. I'm just the Lu Assassin. - You gonna let him say that? - Oh!
translation.ja: 五行の刺客(ウー･アサシン)と ルー･アサシンだ

translation.en: Okay. Okay.
- Oh my God. That's crazy. - Guys, guys, guys.
- Let's get him! - Ah!
- Whoa, whoa, whoa! - He's going in. Get him in the water.
